actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to prohibit the implementation or enforcement of certain regulations.
short_title: Protecting Patients and Health Care Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Protecting Patients and Health Care Act - Prohibits the Secretary of Health and Human Services from finalizing, enforcing, implementing, or taking other action in furtherance of specified proposed regulations regarding conscience clause protections for health care workers and facilities (under the authority of provisions commonly referred to as the Church Amendments and the Weldon Amendment).

titles.title: Protecting Patients and Health Care Act
A bill to prohibit the implementation or enforcement of certain regulations.
